module.name: Backup & Restore
module.description: Backup & Restore for your FreePBX environment
module.changelog: *12.0.13* FREEPBX-8562 Fix NAT regression *12.0.12* FREEPBX-8563 Have backup email pull from sysadmin from is sysadmin exist *12.0.11* FREEPBX-8501 active / passive selection on ftp backup server *12.0.10* FREEPBX-8112 - Trigger sysadmin hooks, if present. *12.0.9* FREEPBX-8045 - onclick won't bind to new elements being added to the DOM *12.0.8* FREEPBX-8059 Re-fix. *12.0.7* FREEPBX-8059 *12.0.6* FREEPBX-5690 and FREEPBX-6978 *12.0.5* FREEPBX-7896 Backup email missing from Advanced Settings *12.0.4* FREEPBX-7842 *12.0.3* Another fix for inital installing *12.0.2* #7682 and #7433 *12.0.1* Updating Issue *12.0.0* #5751 Send Email on backup *2.11.0.18* #7347 *2.11.0.17* #7358 *2.11.0.16* #7383 *2.11.0.15* #7364 *2.11.0.14* #7354 *2.11.0.13* #7349 *2.11.0.12* #7300 *2.11.0.11* Fix License to be v3+ *2.11.0.10* #7239 *2.11.0.9* Generate a license file *2.11.0.8* #5832 Ensure AstDB is regenerated on restore *2.11.0.7* #7155 *2.11.0.6* #6380 *2.11.0.5* #6862, #6863 *2.11.0.4* #6761 *2.11.0.3* #6772 *2.11.0.2* #6730, #6549, #6553 *2.11.0.1* #6083 *2.11.0.0* #6555
